value.name: Diamond in the rough: Dougherty Commission will vote next week on Radium Springs bridge restoration
value.description: Assistant County Administrator Scott Addison told commissioners. Earlier this year, the county hired a company to physically remove the invasive weeds that were present throughout the spring and creek area. The restoration of the bridge, which is part of ...

value.name: House Approves Additional $2B for 'Cash for Clunkers' to Continue
value.description: "It was the right idea, but it was the cart before the horse," Scott Addison of Fitzgerald Auto Mall in Gaithersburg, Md., told ABC News' Elisabeth Leamy. Addison's sales staff was rushing to ...
